story.storybody: Raipur, Jun 1 (PTI) Prime Minister Narendra Modis initiatives like Jan Dhan Yojana are major economy booster for the country, Chhattisgarh Chief Minister Raman Singh said today. He congratulated the Prime Minister to help the country in attaining 7.6 per cent GDP growth in 2015-16, up from 7.2 per cent a year ago, as per a statement issued by the state government. The Chief Minister said NDA governments step to increase state share of central taxes from 32 to 42 per cent has provided the extra fiscal space for the states to execute their own priority schemes. He said that financial inclusion of economically weaker sections of the society through Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana also played a vital role in the rise of the economy. Singh said that launch of Make in India initiatives accelerated the performance of manufacturing sector of the economy. "The NDA government sought investment in several industries, including manufacturing, construction, telecommunications and financial services and invited industrialists from across the world to invest in India and make it a manufacturing hub, giving a boost to jobs and growth," he said. PTI AKV RG
story.shortheadline: PMs initiatives like Jan Dhan major economy booster: CG CM
